alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 07 at 2:47PM EDT until July 07 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Far Northern, and North Woods Maine, including the following areas, in Central Highlands Maine, Central Piscataquis and Northern Penobscot. In Far Eastern Maine, Southeast Aroostook. In Far Northern Maine, Northeast Aroostook and Northwest Aroostook. In North Woods Maine, Northern Piscataquis and Northern Somerset. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong thunderstorms are expected to develop this afternoon possibly bringing torrential downpours resulting in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
